title: Textile, "Extra Hollow Ground", 1977
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on 5-harness satin
markings: Written four times on left edge: (copyright symbol) 1977 Frances Butler
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 354 x 123 cm (11 ft. 7 3/8 in. x 48 7/16 in.)
Repeat H: 107 cm (42 1/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Textile Department Fund
description: A pattern derived from the grid of square tiles as in a bathroom with a tub or seat.  A single blade razor is placed on the illusion of a shelf. Overprint at left edge with margin on right.

tombstone.epitaph:
